item.title: John Ledyard, his trip to Siberia
item.description: A profile of 18th century American explorer and adventurer John Ledyard and his trip to Siberia.

item.title: Elihu Burritt, the learned blacksmith
item.description: A profile of Elihu Burritt, an American diplomat, philanthropist and social activist who was nicknamed "The Learned Blacksmith."
